items.a: Animica prioritizes a deterministic Python VM. EVM compatibility can be added via adapters and precompiles over time.
Proofs (AI/Quantum/Storage/VDF/Hash) produce measurable metrics that feed the PoIES scorer under policy caps.
The project plan includes fee tokens and staking mechanics. Check the roadmap and blog for specifics.
